name: Chicken Island
description:
HI!  This is Chicken. 

Chicken uses his aggs and telekinetic powers to protect his precious island from the evil invadors.

 Now YOU are the Chicken.

Controls:

Press A, S, W, D to move Chicken, and the space bar to jump.

Press Q to lay eggs.

Use your amazing telekinetic power with E.

Game Done by: Aarón Asensio

With some help of Raquel Bañegil

Voxel Art Asset: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/5-animated-voxel-ani...

Game done in about 9 hours of work.
